name: Success Wizard
overview:
Success Wizard develops truly personal, meaningful, and highly effective online coaching programs to help people change, grow and enrich their personal and professional lives.

We focus on creating powerful, engaging and interactive online applications for personal development gurus, life coaching companies, seminar leaders, and training organizations.

Our innovative platform provides a complete and structured online coaching program and a set of interactive tools that educate, guide and support those looking for more clarity, meaning and prosperity in their life, and for people trying to enhance and advance their careers, relationships, health and finances.

These unique life-changing programs integrate the worldâ€™s most effective personal development and coaching techniques to provide a complete step-by-step practical and affordable solution to support users in achieving their personal goals and aspirations.

Success Wizard is set to transform the personal growth market by leveraging the latest mobile, social, and web 2.0 technologies to deliver comprehensive self-development applications and coaching services, with the goal of helping one million people worldwide live happier, more authentic and fulfilling lives.
